summary: The local disability support group visits an involuntary member, not realizing that it will bring them to a critical mass.
cast: Fridtjov Såheim|Kirsti Eline Torhaug|Henrik Mestad|Marian Saastad Ottesen|Kari Simonsen|Per Schaanning|Kjersti Holmen|Christian Soldal|Øyvind Osmo Eriksen
keywords: sex|self pity|man in a wheelchair|long haired male|loneliness
title: Kunsten å tenke negativt
